TEXT.TITLE: AUTOTROL CORP <AUTR.O> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr profit 22 cts vs loss 22 cts Net profit 430,373 vs loss 433,395 Sales 7,723,838 vs 6,219,157 Nine mths Shr profit 49 cts vs loss 1.20 dlrs Net profit 960,008 vs loss 2,338,286 Sales 23.2 mln vs 19.9 mln NOTE: 1986 data restated to reflect operations discontinued in 1986 1986 earnings exclude loss from discontinued operations of 319,055 dlrs, or 16 cts a share in the quarter and 906,962 dlrs, or 46 cts a share for the nine months Reuter
